Preterit.turoyo: u=ʕulmo i=naqqadə-ḥzele i=ʕuǧube d-i=ruḥoqadišo, mhaymanne, w hawənMšəḥoye 12/5 [MT];

Infectum.turoyo: lo hat mhayminətbiya 779; hawxa ko-mhaymnina w hawxa ko-mawdina d-kət-yoMšiḥo u=bro d-aloho LB 94;

Part act..turoyo: hano, u=ḥaroyozlāmrabo, w ham mhayəmno, m-an=noše d-alóho-yo 779; 49/3; balhawīr-dōrdiḏakitoʕitawōṯo, də-bnən b-u=dorotloṯmo w ḥamši, b-u=waxt d-u=malkoAnasṭās u=Mhayəmno 11/54; u=ʕulmayḏaġắlabemhayəmno w mṣalyóno-yo 11/75; u=zlām-anogud l=owe-wa (…) mhaymno b-ruḥe lo=ko-mičək-wa b-i=qamayt-ayḏan w-ṭolab-waminan u=med-ano
translations: ‘If this man were not self-confident, he would not have appeared before us and asked this thing from us’ 78/98;
